document_data.mainbody:
Rihen Isothe was a half-orc aristocratic warrior and illegitimate child of a wealthy human merchant.
In 1374 DR, he traveled to Nesmé to collect a specially-forged family crest.
CategoryHalf-orcs
CategoryBastards
CategoryWarriors
CategoryInhabitants of Faerûn
CategoryInhabitants of Toril

CategoryAristocrats
